price: Реци: “Дошла је истина, а лажи је неповратно нестало!”
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
